roleset.name: put into a group
roleset.note: HERD-V NOTES: I think that sentence is misparsed, too; it's not that theinstitutions are causing some animals to group together, but thatinstitutions are animals that cause something else (customers?investors?) to group together. (from herd.01-v)

role.descr: theme, thing being included in some group

example.name: uninteresting transitive
example.text: ``Institutions are herding animals,'' says Peter Anderson, who heads the pension-fund management arm of IDS Financial Services Inc.

example.name: ARG2
example.text: They were then surrounded by police officers, who-1 *trace*-1 herded them into a group and placed them under arrest.
